Uses of XMLMessageProvider in org.apache.xerces.utils
 

Classes in org.apache.xerces.utils that implement XMLMessageProvider
 class ImplementationMessages
          ImplementationMessages provides messages internal to the parser implementation
 class XMLMessages
          XMLMessages provides error messages for the XML 1.0 Recommendation and for the Namespaces Recommendation

Classes in org.apache.xerces.validators.schema that implement XMLMessageProvider
 class SchemaMessageProvider
          SchemaMessageProvider implements an XMLMessageProvider that provides localizable error messages for the W3C XML Schema Language
